lemma find_base_vectors: assumes ref: "row_echelon_form A" and A: "A \<in> carrier_mat nr nc" shows "set (find_base_vectors A) \<subseteq> mat_kernel A" "0\<^sub>v nc \<notin> set (find_base_vectors A)" "kernel.basis nc A (set (find_base_vectors A))" "card (set (find_base_vectors A)) = nc - card { i. i < nr \<and> row A i \<noteq> 0\<^sub>v nc}" "length (pivot_positions A) = card { i. i < nr \<and> row A i \<noteq> 0\<^sub>v nc}" "kernel.dim nc A = nc - card { i. i < nr \<and> row A i \<noteq> 0\<^sub>v nc}"
